contexts.context: Swift and agile are the Morag Tong. Silent and <mark>unseen</mark> they move. Illusions they supply to misdirect their prey....
...from harm, and the acrobatic discipline finds for them the <mark>unseen</mark> and unlooked-for path. Have you these virtues? Then,...
...must seek the Grandmaster, who by tradition lives in the <mark>unseen</mark> and unlooked-for corners of Vivec City between the blood of...
